Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Radical Pamphlet Literature Collection TAM 358
169 Linear Feet (169 boxes)
1817-1970
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials in this collection were compiled by the Tamiment Library staff. The accession number associated with this collection is 1984.004.
Scope and Contents
SEE THE PUBLISHED GUIDE TO THE COLLECTION: Tamiment Library shelved at Tam Ref HN 90 .R3 T323 Collection of 8,672 pamphlets microfilmed on 89 reels shelved in the Tamiment Library at: R-1743 to R-1831.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Due to the fragile nature of the original materials, researchers must use the microfilmed version of the collection. The microfilm call number is Film R-1746 Non-circulating.
Conditions Governing Use
Materials in this collection, which were created in 1817-1970, are in the public domain. Permission to publish or reproduce is not required.
